content: धर्मिन् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [धर्मोऽस्त्यस्य-इनि] {@--1@} Virtuous, just, pious. {@--2@} Knowing one's duties. {@--3@} Obeying the law. {@--4@} Having the properties of, having the nature, peculiar properties, or characteristics of anything, (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); षट् सुता द्विजधर्मिणः <ls>Ms. 10. 41</ls>; कल्पवृक्षफलधर्मि कांक्षितं <ls>R. 11. 50.</ls> {@--5@} Following the habits of any person. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} An epithet of Viṣṇu.
